Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by Boston in 1980...
Had first career hit on 9/2/1983, off Jon Matlack (NYY)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Oakland on 10/2/1983...
Hit first career homerun on 10/4/1983, off Rick Wise (NYY)...
Traded from Boston to Minnesota on 7/31/1985 (Going to MIN: 3B T. Teufel, LF D. Pasqua. Going to BOS: P R. Guidry)...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1988...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/1/1990 to a 3-year deal worth $800,000 per year...
